item.title: 巴西 Azul 航空公司第一季度亏损收窄
item.description: 巴西航空公司Azul周一报告称，随着巴西航空旅行需求的回升，该公司第一季度的亏损额缩小至3.242亿雷亚尔（约合6286万美元）。【原文：Brazilian airline Azul's losses narrowed in the first quarter to 324.2 million reais ($62.86 million), it reported on Monday, as demand for air travel in the country picked up.】

item.title: 蒂姆-德雷珀（Tim Draper）牵头为比特币借贷背后的六名员工初创公司筹资 350 万美元
item.description: Zest Protocol 是一家只有六名员工的比特币借贷初创公司，在亿万富翁投资者蒂姆-德雷珀（Tim Draper）领投的一轮融资中获得了 350 万美元。【原文：Zest Protocol, a bitcoin lending startup with just six employees, has secured $3.5 million in a funding round led by billionaire investor Tim Draper.】

item.title: 美联储杰斐逊指出通信方面的挑战
item.description: 美联储副主席菲利普-杰斐逊（Phillip Jefferson）周一表示，尽管中央银行与公众进行清晰的沟通非常重要，但有时这些沟通也会变得模糊不清。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice-chair Phillip Jefferson said Monday that while it is important for a central bank to communicate clearly with the public, there are times when those communications can get muddled.】

item.title: 必和必拓称英美资源集团拒绝了修订提案
item.description: 必和必拓集团周一称，英美资源集团拒绝了修订后的收购要约。【原文：BHP Group said on Monday that Anglo American had rejected a revised buyout offer.】

item.title: 耶伦将在弗吉尼亚州乡村之行中吹捧宽带投资
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）将于周一前往弗吉尼亚州斯塔福德县，参观一个由 1.9 万亿美元 COVID 时代的 "美国救援计划"（American Rescue Plan）资助的宽带基础设施项目，并强调投资农村地区的重要性。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen will travel to Stafford County, Virginia on Monday to tour a broadband infrastructure project funded by the $1.9 trillion COVID-era American Rescue Plan and underscore the importance of investing in rural areas.】

item.title: 首席执行官瑞银将把节省的 130 亿美元成本中的一部分再投资于改进流程
item.description: 瑞银集团首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）周一表示，在收购瑞士信贷后，瑞银将把计划节省的 130 亿美元成本中的一部分重新投入到加强银行流程和业务上。【原文：UBS will reinvest part of $13 billion in planned cost savings on making the bank's processes and businesses stronger following the takeover of Credit Suisse, UBS chief executive Sergio Ermotti said on Monday.】

item.title: 咆哮的凯蒂猫》停播三年后回归，GameStop 跳涨
item.description: 2021 年，曾在网上发帖引发电子游戏零售商交易狂潮的社交媒体人物 "咆哮的凯蒂猫 "时隔三年重返 X.com，此后 GameStop 股价在周一盘前交易中大涨 40%。【原文：Shares of GameStop jumped 40% in premarket trading on Monday after social media persona "Roaring Kitty," whose online posts had sparked a trading frenzy in the videogame retailer in 2021, returned on X.com after three years.】

item.title: 中国本周将启动1万亿元刺激性债券发行
item.description: 中国财政部周一表示，将于本周开始销售期待已久的长期特别国债，中国政府希望这将有助于刺激疲软经济中的关键部门。【原文：China's finance ministry said on Monday it would start the long-awaited sales of long-term special treasury bonds that Beijing hopes will help stimulate key sectors of a flagging economy this week.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，英特尔接近与阿波罗达成 110 亿美元的爱尔兰合作协议
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，英特尔正在就一项交易进行深入谈判，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）将提供超过 110 亿美元的资金，帮助英特尔在爱尔兰建立芯片工厂。【原文：Intel is in advanced talks for a transaction in which Apollo Global Management would supply more than $11 billion to help build a chip plant in Ireland, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: J&J 公司将出售分拆后的 Kenvue 公司的全部股份
item.description: 强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）在周一提交的一份文件中表示，将以债转股的方式出售其分拆公司 Kenvue 的全部 1.823 亿股股票。【原文：Johnson & Johnson will sell all its 182.3 million shares in its spun-off company Kenvue in a stock offering in a debt-for-equity exchange, the consumer health product firm said in a filing on Monday.】

item.title: 比尔-黄（Bill Hwang）就价值 360 亿美元的 Archegos 倒闭案开庭陈述
item.description: 周一，曼哈顿联邦法院就黄成国（Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang）因其价值 360 亿美元的基金 Archegos Capital Management 于 2021 年倒闭而受到的指控开庭审理。【原文：The trial of Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang kicks off with opening statements in Manhattan federal court on Monday on charges stemming from the 2021 collapse of his $36 billion fund Archegos Capital Management.】

item.title: 美国汽车工人工会寻求在阿拉巴马州奔驰工厂取得艰难胜利
item.description: 周一，阿拉巴马州一家梅赛德斯-奔驰工厂的工人开始就是否加入联合汽车工人工会进行投票，这是对该工会能否在历来反对工会的美国南方保持发展势头的一次重要考验。【原文：Workers at a Mercedes-Benz plant in Alabama began voting Monday on whether to join the United Auto Workers union, a significant test of whether the labor group can maintain momentum in the historically anti-union American South.】

item.title: 数据密集周伊始，期货走高
item.description: 由于投资者在等待本周的关键通胀数据，以判断今年降息的可能性，美国主要股指期货周一小幅走高，此前曾连续数周上涨。【原文：Futures for the main U.S. indexes were slightly higher on Monday, after several weeks of gains, as investors awaited key inflation figures this week to gauge the likelihood of interest rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 沃尔玛股价接近历史最高纪录，强劲盈利可能已被定价
item.description: 沃尔玛在可自由支配支出疲软的迹象下发布财报，可能会为推动其股价创下历史新高的涨势火上浇油，也可能会吓到那些希望为这家重量级零售商的高价估值寻找理由的投资者。【原文：Walmart's earnings amid signs of weaker discretionary spending could add fuel to a rally that has propelled its shares to record highs, or potentially spook investors looking to justify the heavyweight retailer's pricey valuation.】

item.title: 数字视频广告的霸主地位为电视前期展示蒙上阴影
item.description: 本周，电视高管们将在纽约准备豪华的舞台展示，在一年一度的电视预售季中让广告商们眼花缭乱，而台下一个残酷的经济现实却隐约可见--数字视频广告的支出现在已经超过了传统电视广告。【原文：As television executives prepare lavish stage presentations in New York this week to dazzle advertisers during the annual TV upfront sales season, a harsh economic reality looms offstage -- digital video advertising now eclipses spending on traditional television ads.】

item.title: 马萨诸塞州就 "临时工 "身份问题将优步和 Lyft 告上法庭
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies）和 Lyft 将于周一在美国马萨诸塞州总检察长的诉讼案中出庭受审，马萨诸塞州总检察长指控这两家共享出行公司将其司机错误地归类为独立承包商，而不是成本更高的雇员。【原文：Uber Technologies and Lyft are set to face trial on Monday in a U.S. lawsuit by Massachusetts' attorney general alleging the ride-share companies misclassified their drivers as independent contractors rather than more costly employees.】

item.title: 早间竞价盈利障碍已扫清 - 接下来是 CPI 栅栏
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国对亚马逊旗下 Zoox 汽车展开调查
item.description: 美国汽车安全监管机构周一表示，正在对亚马逊自动驾驶汽车部门 Zoox 的约 500 辆汽车展开初步评估，因为有报告称，配备自动驾驶系统的汽车意外刹车，导致追尾事故。【原文：The U.S. auto safety regulator said on Monday it was opening a preliminary evaluation into an estimated 500 Zoox vehicles, Amazon's self-driving car unit, over reports of vehicles equipped with Automated Driving System unexpectedly braking, leading to rear-end collisions.】

item.title: OpenAI 将于周一宣布改进 ChatGPT 产品
item.description: ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 计划在下周一宣布其旗舰聊天机器人的更新，作为其最先进的人工智能模型 GPT-4，它 "感觉就像魔法一样"，首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）周五在 X 上说。【原文：ChatGPT-maker OpenAI plans to announce on Monday updates to its flagship chatbot as its most advanced AI model GPT-4, which "feels like magic," CEO Sam Altman said on X on Friday.】

item.title: 拜登新关税对中国的冲击有多大？
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国总统拜登最快将于周二宣布对中国征收新的关税，目标行业包括电动汽车、医疗用品和太阳能设备。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden is set to announce new China tariffs as soon as Tuesday, targeting sectors including electric vehicles, medical supplies and solar equipment, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 埃尼希望在能源转型卫星战略中分拆出新的石油和天然气公司
item.description: 意大利能源集团埃尼公司（Eni）的消息人士称，该公司可能会分拆在印尼和象牙海岸等高潜力石油和天然气项目中的股份，以帮助为这些项目的开发提供资金，同时将更多资金集中用于低碳活动。【原文：Italian energy group Eni could spin off stakes in high-potential oil and gas projects, including in Indonesia and Ivory Coast, to help finance their development while focusing more capital on low-carbon activities, company sources said.】

item.title: 软银第四季度实现利润 21 亿美元
item.description: 本周一，日本科技巨头软银集团（SoftBank Group）实现季度盈利，1-3 月份净利润达 3289 亿日元（约合 21.1 亿美元）。【原文：Japanese technology giant SoftBank Group swung to a quarterly profit on Monday, reporting a net profit of 328.9 billion yen ($2.11 billion) for the January-March period.】

item.title: 亚马逊将在法国投资 13 亿美元，创造 3000 个就业岗位
item.description: 亚马逊周一表示，它将向法国业务投资超过 12 亿欧元（13 亿美元），并在法国创造 3000 多个长期工作岗位。【原文：Amazon said on Monday it would invest more than 1.2 billion euros ($1.3 billion) in its French operations and create more than 3,000 permanent jobs in the country.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司亏损显示填补欧盟与中国天然气销售缺口的努力
item.description: 克里姆林宫拥有的能源大亨俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）曾是俄罗斯最赚钱的公司，但由于它正努力通过国内市场和中国出口来填补欧洲天然气销售损失的缺口，因此可能面临长期业绩不佳的局面。【原文：Kremlin-owned energy kingpin Gazprom , once Russia's most profitable company, could face a long period of poor performance as it struggles to fill the gap of lost European gas sales with its domestic market and Chinese exports.】

item.title: 世界铂金协会（WPIC）称，供应减少将导致2024年铂金赤字高于预期
item.description: 世界铂金投资理事会（WPIC）周一表示，由于南非和俄罗斯矿山的供应量减少，2024年全球铂金缺口将比之前预期的更大。【原文：The global platinum deficit in 2024 will be deeper than previously expected due to lower supply from mines in South Africa and Russia, the World Platinum Investment Council (WPIC) said on Monday.】

item.title: 欧洲银行的 "金发反弹 "诱使买家和熊市回归
item.description: 在经历了一个出人意料的乐观财报季之后，投资者正竞相重返欧洲银行股，将其股价推向多年高点，但这一反弹也引来了卖空者，他们押注这种乐观情绪不太可能持久。【原文：Investors are racing back into European bank stocks after a surprisingly upbeat earnings season, pushing their shares to multi-year highs, but the bounce has also lured short sellers betting that the optimism is unlikely to last.】

item.title: 永远维持高利率的理由
item.description: 如果金融市场的判断是正确的，那么利率不仅会在今年居高不下，而且可能会永远居高不下。【原文：If financial markets are right, interest rates won't just stay high this year, but possibly forever.】

item.title: 开普勒称欧洲零售对冲基金资产缩水至 8 年低点
item.description: 据周一公布的数据显示，由于利率上升和业绩落后，小投资者纷纷转投他处，欧洲对冲基金行业的散户投资者正在撤出，管理资产缩水至八年来的最低点。【原文：Retail investors are pulling out of Europe's hedge fund industry, with assets under management shrinking to an eight-year low according to data released on Monday, as higher interest rates and lagging performance send smaller investors elsewhere.】

item.title: 早间竞标美国通胀，每个小数点都很重要
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 微软将在法国投资 40 亿欧元
item.description: 技术和软件巨头微软公司副董事长兼总裁布拉德-史密斯（Brad Smith）告诉《费加罗报》，作为一年一度的 "选择法国 "商业峰会的一部分，微软将在法国投资 40 亿欧元（43 亿美元）。【原文：Technology and software giant Microsoft will invest 4 billion euros ($4.3 billion) in France as part of the annual 'Choose France' business summit, its vice chair and president Brad Smith told Le Figaro paper.】
